title: Five Nights At Freddy's 3

controls: Mouse: Look around, navigate cameras, interact with buttons, and open the maintenance panel.Spacebar: Seal vents.
content.howToPlay: Start your shift at Fazbear's Fright and monitor the security cameras. You need to spend 5 consecutive nights without getting caught by an animatronic.Open the cameras and check if everything is okay and that no animatronics are moving around.Use the audio devices to lure Springtrap away from your office.Keep an eye on system errors and reboot them quickly from the maintenance panel.Watch out for phantom animatronics—they can disable your systems temporarily.Survive until 6 AM to move to the next night.

fullContent: Home› HorrorFive Nights At Freddy's 3By OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenFNAF 3 (Five Nights at Freddy's 3) is an online horror game that takes you back to Fazbear's Fright, a horror attraction built around the mysteries of Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. As in the prequels, you will play as the night guard tasked with monitoring cameras. FNAF 3 feels like revisiting your childhood nightmares, but this time, they've upgraded to HD horror. You will survive 5 tense nights where you try to balance your paranoia and tech management. Reboot this, check that, all while a killer animatronic is playing "guess who" with you. If you loved the first two FNAF games, you will love this installment with more adrenaline than ever. So, if you're ready, hit the start button and see if you can uncover the secrets while making it through the five nights.ControlsMouse: Look around, navigate cameras, interact with buttons, and open the maintenance panel.Spacebar: Seal vents.How to PlayStart your shift at Fazbear's Fright and monitor the security cameras. You need to spend 5 consecutive nights without getting caught by an animatronic.Open the cameras and check if everything is okay and that no animatronics are moving around.Use the audio devices to lure Springtrap away from your office.Keep an eye on system errors and reboot them quickly from the maintenance panel.Watch out for phantom animatronics—they can disable your systems temporarily.Survive until 6 AM to move to the next night.DeveloperScott Cawthon created FNAF 3.More Horror GamesIf you're looking for a game where every click could be your last, FNAF 3 delivers that wrapped in a haunted animatronic suit. In case you're looking for a similar thrill? Play other FNAF games on OnlineGames.io or explore Horror Granny for more survival horror fun. There's always more terror to uncover!This article was updated on November 12, 20241 Player2DActionAvoidCrazyFreeHorrorMobileSurvival
